channel.title: My first app
channel.description:
Ok, basically it reads what is enter'd into the command prompt and saves it to a file. Pretty useless I know. :)
Credits - http://www.javacoffeebreak.com/faq/faq0004.html for the file writing technique
EDIT: Almost forgot, to write the data to file, enter a string with no data, in other words, push enter twice. I might change this later. :)

item.title: My first app
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

haha…my first java app was a Calories Burned calculator using input from the user for weight, distance ran, and time per mile and stuff like that. Then the second one we had to create a seconds to days, hours and minutes, and seconds (using the % modifier), along with writing another class to translate English to Pig Latin and back to English based on the input.

Read full topic
